item.description: […] Embodied energy cost of opportunity cost. Which would be a true metric of decision making where res… End of Ownership, Circular Economy Proof of Brain and Primary, Intermediary and Consumption Energy Tokens. A Framework Evolves. GRAND BARGAINS, DANGEROUS CHOICES? & False Equivalences. “Land of Brave” or “The Rising Sun” . Trumps Trade War.or Who ate all the pies? 2. Starting assumption. In short, in a purely hypothetical situation in which it could be proved that the environmental activists were wrong, there’d be a huge collective sigh of relief, from government, business and the general public alike. Few people, after all, really like change and disruption. #BeLikeVinnie […]
